mapper.insert: insert into attribute (id, name, retrieval_flag, attribute_type, sort, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retrievalFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{attributeType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
